summary: A thought-provoking and powerful documentary film on the current and historical root causes of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict and U.S. political involvement.
cast: James Akins|Arik Ascherman|Bishop Barltlett Jr.|Phyllis Bennis|Peter Bouckaert|Francis Boyle|Sharon Burke|Noam Chomsky|Drew Christiansen|Ramsey Clark|Douglas Dicks|Richard Falk|Paul Findley|Thomas Getman|Neta Golan|Jeff Halper|Amira Hass|Kathleen Kamphoefner|Adem Keller|Hava Keller|Rashid Khalidi|Peretz Kidron|Rabbi Lilian|Allegra Pacheco|Hedva Radonavitz|Yael Stein|Gila Svirsky|Edward Walker|Alison Weir
title: Occupation 101
